General.Name: NÜRNBERGER Beteiligungs-AG
General.Description: NÜRNBERGER Beteiligungs-AG operates as an insurance company in Germany. The company offers car, liability, homeowners, household, shell, household glass, housing protection letter, legal expenses, health, long-term care, health, disability, dread disease, accident, basic ability, life, pension, musical instrument, horse transport, sports boat hull, baggage, valuables, event, childcare, supplementary dental, funeral, and glasses and hearing aids insurance; private, professional, dog owner, hunting, home and landowner, and water liability insurance; assistance insurance for civil servants; and financial products. It also provides contents, glass, commercial building, construction, building services, machinery breakdown, electronics, photovoltaic, cyber, intellectual property, company liability, motor vehicle, transport, fleet, multi risk, and exhibition insurance products. The company was founded in 1884 and is based in Nuremberg, Germany.
